name: Welcome Home Master
description:
Developed during Global Game Jam 2019. The theme for the Jam was "What home means to you" so we developed a game about a dog waiting for his master. The product has been uploaded as it was when the dead line hit so expect some quirks and issues.

The most notable that isn't mentioned in the game is you can press 'R' to restart the level.

Developed with:

Jonathan Lam

Jeremy Andriano

You can view other details here:

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/welcome-home-master
